mapper.select: SELECT P.FG_POST_ID AS fgPostId, P.FG_POST_TITLE AS fgPostTitle, P.FG_USER_CODE AS fgUserCode, P.FG_POST_CREATED_AT AS fgPostCreatedAt, NU.FG_NORMAL_NAME AS fgNormalName, R.FG_RECIPE_INGREDIENTS AS fgReceipeIngredients, R.FG_RECIPE_TIME AS fgReceipeTime, R.FG_RECIPE_CONTENT AS fgReceipeContent, P.FG_POST_VIEWS AS fgPostViews, UF.FG_USER_FILE_ID AS userFileId, UF.FG_USER_FILE_NAME AS userFileName, UF.FG_USER_FILE_ROOT AS userFileRoot, UF.FG_USER_FILE_UUID AS userFileUuid FROM FG_POST P JOIN FG_NORMAL_USER NU ON P.FG_USER_CODE = NU.FG_USER_CODE JOIN FG_RECIPE R ON P.FG_POST_ID = R.FG_POST_ID LEFT JOIN FG_USER_FILE UF ON NU.FG_USER_CODE = UF.FG_USER_CODE WHERE P.FG_POST_TYPE = 'recipe' AND P.FG_POST_ID = #{fgPostId}

SELECT P.FG_POST_ID AS fgPostId, P.FG_POST_TYPE AS fgPostType, F.FG_POST_FILE_ID AS postFileId, F.FG_POST_FILE_NAME AS postFileName, F.FG_POST_FILE_ROOT AS postFileRoot, F.FG_POST_FILE_UUID AS postFileUuid, P.FG_POST_TITLE AS fgPostTitle, R.FG_RECIPE_TIME AS fgReceipeTime, P.FG_POST_LIKES AS fgLikes FROM FG_POST P LEFT JOIN FG_RECIPE R ON P.FG_POST_ID = R.FG_POST_ID LEFT JOIN FG_POST_FILE F ON P.FG_POST_ID = F.FG_POST_ID WHERE P.FG_POST_TYPE = 'recipe' ORDER BY P.FG_POST_CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, fgPostId, fgPostType, fgPostTitle, fgReceipeTime, fgLikes, fgViews, postFileId, postFileName, postFileRoot, postFileUuid FROM ( SELECT P.FG_POST_ID AS fgPostId, P.FG_POST_TYPE AS fgPostType, P.FG_POST_TITLE AS fgPostTitle, R.FG_RECIPE_TIME AS fgReceipeTime, P.FG_POST_LIKES AS fgLikes, P.FG_POST_VIEWS as fgViews, F.FG_POST_FILE_ID AS postFileId, F.FG_POST_FILE_NAME AS postFileName, F.FG_POST_FILE_ROOT AS postFileRoot, F.FG_POST_FILE_UUID AS postFileUuid FROM FG_POST P LEFT JOIN FG_RECIPE R ON P.FG_POST_ID = R.FG_POST_ID LEFT JOIN FG_POST_FILE F ON P.FG_POST_ID = F.FG_POST_ID WHERE P.FG_POST_TYPE = 'recipe' ORDER BY P.FG_POST_CREATED_AT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}

INSERT INTO FG_POST_FILE ( FG_POST_FILE_ID, FG_POST_FILE_NAME, FG_POST_FILE_ROOT, FG_POST_FILE_UUID, FG_POST_FILE_TIME, FG_POST_ID ) VALUES ( #{fgPostFileId}, #{fgPostFileName}, #{fgPostFileRoot}, #{fgPostFileUUID}, SYSDATE, #{fgPostId} )
